PROMPTSETXUI.XUIEDITOR:
<dialog height="506" icon="PRPT" id="PRPTS" left="279" top="4" width="420"><readpanel fill="b" id="PRPTBOX" nl="1" scroll="v" text="Parameters"><properties><entry name="text">Parameters</entry><entry name="modifiable">0</entry></properties><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_PACKAGEs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="DEB package" tooltip="Name of the deb package or file to install. The file name may contain also a path. Following entries are e.g. valid: package.deb /path/to/package.deb" upper="0" required="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">DEB package</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_PACKAGEs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Name of the deb package or file to install. The file name may contain also a path. Following entries are e.g. valid:
package.deb
/path/to/package.deb</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Fail if installed" tooltip="Fails, if the package with the same version is already installed." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Fail if installed</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_FAIL_IF_INSTALLEDs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Fails, if the package with the same version is already installed.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_RECURSIVEs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Recursive install" tooltip="Recursively handle all regular files matching pattern *.deb found at specified directories and all of its subdirectories. This can be used with -i, -A, --install, --unpack and --avail actions." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Recursive install</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_RECURSIVEs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Recursively handle all regular files matching pattern *.deb found at specified directories and all of its subdirectories. This can be used with -i, -A, --install,
--unpack and --avail actions.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_INSTALL_DIRs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Install directory" tooltip="Change default installation directory which refers to the directory where packages are to be installed. instdir is also the directory passed to chroot(2) before running packages installation scripts, which means that the scripts see instdir as a root directory. (Defaults to /) The option --instdir=dir is only generated if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Install directory</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_INSTALL_DIRs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Change default installation directory which refers to the directory where packages are to be installed. instdir is also the directory passed to chroot(2) before running packages installation scripts, which means that the scripts see instdir as a root directory. (Defaults to /) The option --instdir=dir is only generated if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_ADMIN_DIRs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Package administrative directory" tooltip="Change default administrative directory, which contains many files that give information about status of installed or uninstalled packages, etc. (Defaults to /var/lib/dpkg). The option --admindir=dir is only generated if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Package administrative directory</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_ADMIN_DIRs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Change default administrative directory, which contains many files that give information about status of installed or uninstalled packages, etc. (Defaults to /var/lib/dpkg). The option --admindir=dir is only generated if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_IGNORE_SIGN_CHECKs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Ignore package signature check" tooltip="Do not try to verify package signatures. Uses the ----no-debsig flag if parameter set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Ignore package signature check</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_IGNORE_SIGN_CHECKs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Do not try to verify package signatures. Uses the ----no-debsig flag if parameter set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_IGNORE_PKG_DEPSs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Ignore depends package list" tooltip="Ignore dependency-checking for specified packages (actually, checking is performed, but only warnings about conflicts are given, nothing else). The option --ignore-depends=package,... is only generated if the parameter is not empty." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Ignore depends package list</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_IGNORE_PKG_DEPSs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Ignore dependency-checking for specified packages (actually, checking is performed, but only warnings about conflicts are given, nothing else). The option --ignore-depends=package,... is only generated if the parameter is not empty.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text><dynradiogroup enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_DEB_SKIP_SAME_VERSIONs.00" nl="1" quotes="" text="Skip package install with same version" tooltip="Don't install the package if the same version of thepackage is already installed. The option --skip-same-version is only generated if the parameter is set to yes." alt="1" required="0"><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.VARA.YES_NO</entry><entry name="text">Skip package install with same version</entry><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_DEB_SKIP_SAME_VERSIONs.00</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Don't install the package if the same version of thepackage is already installed. The option --skip-same-version is only generated if the parameter is set to yes.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/></properties></dynradiogroup><text enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" nl="1" regex="" required="0" separator=";" showaspassword="1" text="Sudo password" tooltip="Sudo password." upper="0" alt="1" multiline="0" multilineIcon="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Sudo password</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_SUDO_PASSWORDs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">1</entry><entry name="tooltip">Sudo password.</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">0</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="multiline">0</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="onchangereset"/><entry name="resetable">1</entry></properties></text></readpanel></dialog>
